thread.section_title: Hotel Duo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing location, serious comfort
thread.title_full: Amazing location, serious comfort - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Amyglees
title: Amazing location, serious comfort
text: This hotel could not have been in a more convenient location, literally down the road from Hotel de Ville and Notre Dame, we even walked to The Louvre! Right beside the high street yet quiet enough, we had a top floor room. The bed and bath were pure luxury, and the staff were so helpful when we needed directions or recommendations. Highly recommend staying here!
